SEARCH

Class Bill

java.lang.Object
Bill
public class Bill extends Object
Represents a legislative bill proposed in the assembly. Contains details such as title, description, and current status of the bill.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Bill(String title, String description)
    Constructor to initialize a bill with title and description.

  • Constructor Details

    • Bill

      public Bill(String title, String description)
      Constructor to initialize a bill with title and description. Sets the default status of the bill to "proposed".
      Parameters:
      title - Title of the bill.
      description - Description of the bill.

  • Method Details

    • updateStatus

      public void updateStatus(String status)
      Updates the status of the bill.
      Parameters:
      status - New status of the bill.

    • getDetails

      public String getDetails()
      Returns the details of the bill.
      Returns:
      String containing the title, description, and status of the bill.

    • getTitle

      public String getTitle()
      Gets the title of the bill.
      Returns:
